changeSet.sql: -- procedure para obter nota mÃ©dia das turmas CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION obter_nota_media_turma() RETURNS TABLE (turma_id BIGINT, turma VARCHAR(255), nota_media NUMERIC) AS $$ BEGIN RETURN QUERY SELECT d.nome as nomeDisciplina, p.nome as nomeProfessor, AVG(a.nota) AS notaMedia FROM turma t JOIN avaliacao a ON t.id = a.turma_id JOIN professor p on t.professor_id = p.id JOIN disciplina d on t.disciplina_id = d.id GROUP BY d.nome, p.nome; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
